title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
skull of his master, the ancient vampire Velioth. Succeed in 3 Wisdom checks to learn about Cazador's Ritual. There's a Pelorsun Blade on the lower level of the dungeon. Enter through the Crypt door and you will find Sebastion and Chessa who will trigger a few quest updates.

Interact with all the points of interest in the area and you will be able to record the following journals:

Astarion met Sebastian, one of the first victims he ever brought Cazador. Instead of feeding on him, Cazador turne
